p: The healthy fresh leaves of seven Mascarene endemic plants were collected in Mauritius and deposited at the Mauritius herbarium, where plant species were authenticated by Kersley Pynee, National Parks & Conservation Service, Mauritius ( Table 1). The leaves were air-dried followed by exhaustive maceration with aqueous methanol (80%, v/v) and freeze-dried as described previously [ 73]. The assay results were expressed in terms of the lyophilized weight of extracts.
